Package aas_core.aas3_0.types.model

Interface IProperty

All Superinterfaces:
IClass, IDataElement, IHasDataSpecification, IHasExtensions, IHasSemantics, IQualifiable, IReferable, ISubmodelElement
All Known Implementing Classes:
EnhancedProperty, Property
public interface IProperty extends IDataElement
A property is a data element that has a single value.

Constraints:

  • Constraint AASd-007: If both, the getValue() and the getValueId() are present then the value of getValue() needs to be identical to the value of the referenced coded value in getValueId().
